main event: An observer spotted a bright object while watching an aircraft through binoculars in Newton Center, Massachusetts on October 27, 1953.
interesting points: The object was about 50-55 ft. in diameter and seemed to be rotating., The object emitted a bright light source., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object hovered briefly before speeding off at a high rate of speed., The object was visually observed from the ground using binoculars.
witness description: an individual using binoculars to observe an aircraft
